mapper.select: SELECT wor_booktype.BookTypeId, wor_booktype.BookTypeName, wor_booktype.BookTypeDescription FROM wor_booktype

SELECT wor_book.BookId, wor_book.UserId, wor_book.BookName, wor_book.BookCoverImage, wor_book.Sort, wor_book.BookIntroduction, wor_book.BookUpdate, wor_book.BookWordCount, wor_book.BookStatus, wor_book.BookHit, wor_book.BookCollect, wor_book.BookCopperCoins, newest.id as VolumeId, newest.VolumeName, sys_user.UserName FROM wor_book LEFT JOIN sys_user ON wor_book.UserId = sys_user.UserId INNER JOIN (SELECT wor_book_booktype.BookId FROM wor_book_booktype WHERE wor_book_booktype.BookTypeId = #{bookTypeId}) booktype ON wor_book.BookId = booktype.BookId LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(VolumeId) as id, VolumeName, BookId from wor_volume WHERE VolumeStatus = 0 GROUP BY BookId) newest ON booktype.BookId = newest.BookId WHERE wor_book.BookStatus = '0';

SELECT wor_ wor_book.BookId, wor_book.UserId, wor_book.BookName, wor_book.BookCoverImage, wor_book.Sort, wor_book.BookIntroduction, wor_book.BookUpdate, wor_book.BookWordCount, wor_book.BookStatus, wor_book.BookHit, wor_book.BookCollect, wor_book.BookCopperCoins, wor_book.BookSilverCoins FROM wor_book INNER JOIN (SELECT wor_book_booktype.BookId FROM wor_book_booktype WHERE wor_book_booktype.BookTypeId = #{bookTypeId}) booktype ON wor_book.BookId = booktype.BookId WHERE wor_book.BookStatus = '0'
